name: RISK 231 D100
prerequisites: BC Mathematics 12 (or equivalent) or any 100-level MATH course with a minimum grade of C.

name: RISK 311 D100
prerequisites: One of RISK (or ACMA) 101 or RISK 102, and all of RISK (or ACMA) 201, RISK (or ACMA) 231 and STAT 270, all with a minimum grade of C.

name: RISK 321 D100
prerequisites: RISK (or ACMA) 101 or RISK 102, with a minimum grade of C. Corequisite: STAT 330, RISK 231.

name: RISK 336 D100
prerequisites: Students must apply and receive permission from the co-op coordinator at least one but preferably two terms in advance. They will normally be required to have completed 45 units with a GPA of 2.50 before they may take this practicum course.

name: RISK 337 D100
prerequisites: RISK (or ACMA) 336 or Job Practicum I from another department. Students must apply and receive permission from the co-op coordinator at least one term in advance.

name: RISK 412 D100
prerequisites: RISK 311 or ACMA 301, with a minimum grade of C. Corequisite: RISK 441 or ACMA 340, with a minimum grade of C.

name: RISK 436 D100
prerequisites: RISK (or ACMA) 337 or Job Practicum II from another department. Students must apply and receive permission from the co-op coordinator at least one term in advance.

name: RISK 437 D100
prerequisites: RISK (or ACMA) 436 or Job Practicum III from another department. Students must apply and receive permission from the co-op coordinator at least one term in advance.

name: RISK 438 D100
prerequisites: RISK (or ACMA) 437 or Job Practicum IV from another department. Students must apply and receive permission from the co-op coordinator at least one term in advance.
